Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Value”
Reviews.Author: nicmonson
Reviews.Content: nice price free breakfasts free wifi actually perfect sol station middle city lots noise night location bring ear plugs bother personally slept fine reviews complain

Reviews.Title: “Great central location”
Reviews.Author: gibby1701
Reviews.Content: stayed nights october enjoyed stay clean enjoyed comfortable nights sleep breakfast choice continental style lots cheeses cold meats breads cereals fruit feature hotel location streets puerta del sol numerous bars restaurants hotel short choice

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: marinadobrota
Reviews.Content: compare money quality definitely top clean cozy bed pretty relaxing bathroom noisy night didnt mind bit breakfast curly brunette reception desk wasnt bright deal

Reviews.Title: “If you don't want to sleep at all, make a reservation in this hotel”
Reviews.Author: KarenandEric
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights tidy beds bathroom clean biggest noise street night hotel located visiting unfortunately located street lot nightlife night quiet 300 am third night noisy night till 6 am 200 people standing street outside discotheque beside front hotel lot noisy screaming shouting street window closed doesnt difference top ambulance middle night pick drunk 5 minutes breakfast poor

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Madrisol
HotelInfo.Address: C/ Nunez de Arce, 1 | Junto a la Puerta del Sol, Madrid, Spain
